faq.question: Is my conversation data secure?
faq.answer: Yes! All processing happens locally on your machine. We never store or access your personal conversations.

faq.question: How long does AI training take?
faq.answer: Training typically takes 15-30 minutes depending on the size of your conversation history.

faq.question: Can I export my trained AI agents?
faq.answer: Yes, Pro and Enterprise users can export their trained models for use in other applications.

faq.question: What if I'm not satisfied?
faq.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. No questions asked.
